_header: When thou hast gathered all that thou may
_description: The inevitability of death — one couplet

BLHar2321.Transcription: When thou hast gathered all þat thou maythen shalt departe & nowest not what day
BLHar2321.Note: Added to lower margin by a later hand.
BLHar2321.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 1.208.
